name: Citizen Center
vaccines: Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine, Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine
info: 2nd dose Moderna for 4/21 and 4/22 Also 1st doses for those living, working or attending school in Haverhill 18 years or older
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Randolph InterGenerational Center (RICC)
info: Drive through clinic, do not come if you are sick, ID required, wear loose-fitting clothing, cannot be vaccinated within 2 weeks of any other vaccinations.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Rutland Public Library
